item.title: Second meetup: Call for Input
item.description:
The second meetup is scheduled for Friday, March 15, 2019, again 19:00 CET at Basislager. Do you have an idea for a presentation, lightning talk, code review or any other activity? Let us know until March, 1 2019 by filling out this form:

  • https://goo.gl/forms/btBm0tInUp25XdUi2

You can also send us ideas by email!

For some inspiration, there is a list of topics, we discussed at the first meetup.

See you there!
